about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: Trucks' blind spots are:
hasPart.assesses: Trucks' blind spots are: | Trucks' blind spots are: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A truck's blind spots are much larger than a smaller car’s blind spots. The driver cannot see your car behind their vehicle and you can't see what’s happening in traffic ahead if you're driving too closely behind the truck. Whether you are driving behind or to the side of the truck, if you can’t see the driver’s face in their side view mirror, then they can’t see you.

comment.text: Directly behind the body.

suggestedAnswer.text: On the immediate left of the cab.

comment.text: On the immediate left of the cab.

suggestedAnswer.text: Both on the immediate left of the cab and directly behind the body.

comment.text: Both on the immediate left of the cab and directly behind the body.

acceptedAnswer.text: Both on the immediate left of the cab and directly behind the body.

comment.text: Both on the immediate left of the cab and directly behind the body.

answerExplanation.text: A truck's blind spots are much larger than a smaller car’s blind spots. The driver cannot see your car behind their vehicle and you can't see what’s happening in traffic ahead if you're driving too closely behind the truck. Whether you are driving behind or to the side of the truck, if you can’t see the driver’s face in their side view mirror, then they can’t see you.

comment.text: Trucks' blind spots are: | A truck's blind spots are much larger than a smaller car’s blind spots. The driver cannot see your car behind their vehicle and you can't see what’s happening in traffic ahead if you're driving too closely behind the truck. Whether you are driving behind or to the side of the truck, if you can’t see the driver’s face in their side view mirror, then they can’t see you.

educationalAlignment.targetDescription: Trucks' blind spots are: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions

hasPart.name: This sign means:
hasPart.assesses: This sign means: | This sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Diamond-shaped signs are used to warn of actual or possible hazards. The color orange is used for warning signs usually found in construction or maintenance areas.

comment.text: Road construction/maintenance area.
Side road.
Railroad ahead.
Road construction/maintenance area.

answerExplanation.text: Diamond-shaped signs are used to warn of actual or possible hazards. The color orange is used for warning signs usually found in construction or maintenance areas.

comment.text: This sign means: | Diamond-shaped signs are used to warn of actual or possible hazards. The color orange is used for warning signs usually found in construction or maintenance areas.

educationalAlignment.targetDescription: This sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions

hasPart.name: This road sign means:
hasPart.assesses: This road sign means: | This road sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: An octagonal sign always means stop. When approaching a stop sign, you must come to a complete stop at the marked stop line and proceed only when it is safe to do so. If there is no stop line, stop before the crosswalk. If there is no crosswalk, stop before the intersection at a point from which you can see oncoming traffic.

comment.text: Slow down or stop.
Stop if necessary.

suggestedAnswer.text: You must come to a complete stop.

comment.text: You must come to a complete stop.

acceptedAnswer.text: You must come to a complete stop.

comment.text: You must come to a complete stop.

answerExplanation.text: An octagonal sign always means stop. When approaching a stop sign, you must come to a complete stop at the marked stop line and proceed only when it is safe to do so. If there is no stop line, stop before the crosswalk. If there is no crosswalk, stop before the intersection at a point from which you can see oncoming traffic.

comment.text: This road sign means: | An octagonal sign always means stop. When approaching a stop sign, you must come to a complete stop at the marked stop line and proceed only when it is safe to do so. If there is no stop line, stop before the crosswalk. If there is no crosswalk, stop before the intersection at a point from which you can see oncoming traffic.

hasPart.name: To see objects in their blind spot when changing lanes, drivers should check:

about.name: To see objects in their blind spot when changing lanes, drivers should check:

hasPart.assesses: To see objects in their blind spot when changing lanes, drivers should check: | To see objects in their blind spot when changing lanes, drivers should check: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Your vehicle's blind spots are the areas that you cannot see in your mirrors. Look over the appropriate shoulder to check your blind spot when changing lanes.

comment.text: Only the left outside mirror.

suggestedAnswer.text: Over their left or right shoulder.

comment.text: Over their left or right shoulder.
Only the inside rearview mirror.

acceptedAnswer.text: Over their left or right shoulder.

comment.text: Over their left or right shoulder.

answerExplanation.text: Your vehicle's blind spots are the areas that you cannot see in your mirrors. Look over the appropriate shoulder to check your blind spot when changing lanes.

comment.text: To see objects in their blind spot when changing lanes, drivers should check: | Your vehicle's blind spots are the areas that you cannot see in your mirrors. Look over the appropriate shoulder to check your blind spot when changing lanes.

hasPart.name: This white sign means you should not pass other vehicles:

about.name: This white sign means you should not pass other vehicles:

hasPart.assesses: This white sign means you should not pass other vehicles: | This white sign means you should not pass other vehicles: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A white rectangular sign indicates that you must obey the stated rule. This sign means that drivers should not pass other vehicles for any reason.

suggestedAnswer.text: Until after you pass the sign.

comment.text: Until after you pass the sign.

suggestedAnswer.text: Unless it seems safe to do so.

comment.text: Unless it seems safe to do so.
For any reason.
For any reason.

answerExplanation.text: A white rectangular sign indicates that you must obey the stated rule. This sign means that drivers should not pass other vehicles for any reason.

comment.text: This white sign means you should not pass other vehicles: | A white rectangular sign indicates that you must obey the stated rule. This sign means that drivers should not pass other vehicles for any reason.

hasPart.name: If a motorist sees pedestrians in an upcoming crosswalk, what should the motorist do?

about.name: If a motorist sees pedestrians in an upcoming crosswalk, what should the motorist do?

hasPart.assesses: If a motorist sees pedestrians in an upcoming crosswalk, what should the motorist do? | If a motorist sees pedestrians in an upcoming crosswalk, what should the motorist do? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A driver must yield the right-of-way to a pedestrian within a crosswalk. The driver should wait until the intersection is clear to proceed.

suggestedAnswer.text: Continue ahead. The motorist has the right-of-way.

comment.text: Continue ahead. The motorist has the right-of-way.

suggestedAnswer.text: Wait for the pedestrians to cross the street.

comment.text: Wait for the pedestrians to cross the street.

suggestedAnswer.text: Pull to the right and go around the pedestrians.

comment.text: Pull to the right and go around the pedestrians.

acceptedAnswer.text: Wait for the pedestrians to cross the street.

comment.text: Wait for the pedestrians to cross the street.

answerExplanation.text: A driver must yield the right-of-way to a pedestrian within a crosswalk. The driver should wait until the intersection is clear to proceed.

comment.text: If a motorist sees pedestrians in an upcoming crosswalk, what should the motorist do? | A driver must yield the right-of-way to a pedestrian within a crosswalk. The driver should wait until the intersection is clear to proceed.
